solution_line_template: On highways, the Jensen family used {highway_miles} miles / {highway_mpg} miles/gallon = <<{highway_miles}/{highway_mpg}={gallons_highway}>>{gallons_highway} gallons of gas.
On city streets, the Jensen family used {city_miles} miles / {city_mpg} miles/gallon = <<{city_miles}/{city_mpg}={gallons_city}>>{gallons_city} gallons of gas.
Total, the Jensen family used {gallons_highway} gallons + {gallons_city} gallons = <<{gallons_highway}+{gallons_city}={total_gallons}>>{total_gallons} gallons of gas.
